Q_DESC:
Given a list of N integers, your task is to find out the miniumum and maximum.                           
 
Input Format:                                    

No.of integers and the integers
TESTCASE_1:
5
2 3 1 6 7
###---###SEPERATOR---###---
Minimum element in an array : 1
Maximum element in an array : 7
TESTCASE_2:
6
11 2 10 6 5 1
###---###SEPERATOR---###---
Minimum element in an array : 1
Maximum element in an array : 11
TESTCASE_3:
8
11 10 2 4 8 7 6 20 
###---###SEPERATOR---###---
Minimum element in an array : 2
Maximum element in an array : 20
TESTCASE_4:
5
22 4 66 31 10 
###---###SEPERATOR---###---
Minimum element in an array : 4
Maximum element in an array : 66
